Title: Includes middle eastern and north African persons in the definition of minority group member for purposes of participation by minority group members and women with respect to state contracts
Summary: Includes middle Eastern and North African persons in the definition of "minority group member" for purposes of participation by minority group members and women with respect to state contracts.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to including middle eastern and north African persons in the definition of "minority group member" for purposes of participation by minority group members and women with respect to state contracts
